subject: game over
body:
I know what you did.

you forgot to lock my mainframe access when I left the company, all the evidence is safe. i copied everything on wednesday and spent yesterday putting together all the pieces of proof. it's not like I don't have the time. do you know what the lead detective of the case said when I brought along the files? that it was hard to believe your stupidity
I find it hard to believe your honorlessness

by monday you'll be locked away
